channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #182, including every tabletop rpg project started between 10/29 and 11/07
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #182, including every tabletop rpg project started between 10/29 and 11/07. It is the first Collection that’s appearing in the original weekly schedule. Still there are 68 projects with a total of 18 English games. With out any ado, here are the list: English Crowdfundings 5 Roleplaying Games 2 Cyberpunk Roleplaying Games 2 Science Fiction Roleplaying Games 4 Urban Fantasy Roleplaying Games 3 Solo Roleplaying Games 1 Larp Rulebook 1 Hybrid Roleplaying Game 2 Settings 2 Sourcebooks 3 D&D 5E Sourcebooks 6 Adventures 11 D&D 5E Adventures 7 Dice Projects 4 Dice Accessoires 2 Accessoires 1 Deck of Cards 1 Notebook 1 Map Project 1 Enamel Pin 2 Various RPG Projects German Crowdfundings 1 Sourcebook Spanish Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Game French Crowdfundings 2 Roleplaying Games 1 Sourcebook 1 YouTube Serie 1 Notebook Article: https://teylen.blog/2021/11/07/crowdfunding-collection-183/

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #182, including every tabletop rpg project started between 10/29 and 11/07
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #182, including every tabletop rpg project started between 10/29 and 11/07.

It is the first Collection that’s appearing in the original weekly schedule. Still there are 68 projects with a total of 18 English games. With out any ado, here are the list:

English Crowdfundings

5 Roleplaying Games
2 Cyberpunk Roleplaying Games
2 Science Fiction Roleplaying Games
4 Urban Fantasy Roleplaying Games
3 Solo Roleplaying Games
1 Larp Rulebook
1 Hybrid Roleplaying Game
2 Settings
2 Sourcebooks
3 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
6 Adventures
11 D&D 5E Adventures
7 Dice Projects
4 Dice Accessoires
2 Accessoires
1 Deck of Cards
1 Notebook
1 Map Project
1 Enamel Pin
2 Various RPG Projects

German Crowdfundings

1 Sourcebook

Spanish Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game

French Crowdfundings

2 Roleplaying Games
1 Sourcebook
1 YouTube Serie
1 Notebook

Article: https://teylen.blog/2021/11/07/crowdfunding-collection-183/

Read full topic
